page.title: 03Hillside by Montrose.
page.content: The people of{Hillside}see themselves as a different community from Montrose and value the green fields that lie between the village and the town.The {adult population}is about 900 and could be split into Hospital workers,commuters,retired,and those who live and work in the village of whom there are only six!There are two {shops.A grocers and a newsagent}which is also the Post Office.The primary {school and Church}are next to the {Village Hall}where a variety of clubs meet.eg.WRI,country dance,Young Wives. There is a football club,Hillside Lads that plays in the public park.A bowling green and tennis courts are also well used in the summer months.In Hillside,everyone knows everyone else and is interested in their neighbour. This "noseyness" creates a sense of community and a separate identity.
